#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
using namespace std;
main()
{
	int n,a,b,c,t;
	long long count;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	count=0;
	cin>>n>>a>>b>>c;
	for(int i=0;i<=min(a,n);i++)
	{
		n=n-i;
		for(int j=0;j<=min(b,n);j++)
		{
			n=n-j;
			//for(int k=0;k<=min(c,k);k++)
			count+=min(c,n)+1;
			n=n+j;
		}
		n=n+i;
	}
	cout<<count<<"\n";
	}
}
